Room.Name: Guard Headquarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the headquarters of the palace guard for Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: Several clerks move about the room, and a couple of lieutenants lounge at a table, casually playing cards. The Captain of the Guard has an office here, and the place is neat and clean. Against one wall is a weapons bank, lined with halbards, swords and other brightly glittering hand weapons. Troop banners hang from the high ceiling.
